column4: shortly you'll receive an e-mail with instructions to change your password
remember to check your spam folder

With the FREE plan you don't have to pay anything to use PostCanal.com.

Whenever you feel confortable you can upgrade anytime to a different subscription.
Shortly you'll receive an e-mail with a link to confirm you subscription. After this, you're ready to start using PostCanal.com.
Remember to check your spam folder.
